candidates.title: Hire New Sales Rep
candidates.subtitle: We have some pre-selected candidates for you. Choose a profile or create your own from scratch.
candidates.createDescription: Customize every detail of your sales rep

lucas.name: LUCAS
lucas.quote: First I understand, then I suggest

marina.name: MARINA
marina.quote: I get straight to the point, no beating around the bush

channel.question: Where do you want me to work?
channel.info: You can connect your account to this channel after hiring the sales rep.

product.greeting: Hi! I'm {{name}}, your new sales rep. I'll ask you a few quick questions to understand how I can help you better.
product.question: First, tell me: What do you sell?
product.placeholder: E.g.: Clinic management system that automates scheduling and medical records...

target.question: Now tell me: Who should I talk to? Who makes the purchase decision?

connection.question: Now I need to know: how do you want me to make the first contact?
connection.messageQuestion: What do you want me to say in the connection request?

silent.name: SILENT CONNECTION
silent.description: I send a request WITHOUT a message. When they accept, I start the conversation.
pros: More natural, seems like a genuine connection

with-intro.name: REQUEST WITH INTRODUCTION
with-intro.description: I send a request WITH an elaborate message. When they accept, I wait 1 hour. If they don't speak, I start.
pros: Person already knows what it's about

ice-breaker.name: SIMPLE ICE-BREAKER
ice-breaker.description: I send a request with a simple rapport message. I only continue IF the person responds.
pros: Only talks to those who showed interest

connection.defaultMessage:
Hi {{first_name}}, how are you?

I saw that you work as {{title}} at {{company}}.
I've been helping companies like yours to [benefit].

Want to connect?

style.question: What conversation style do you want me to use?

direct.name: STRAIGHT TO THE POINT
direct.example: I saw you own Clinic X. We help clinics reduce 40% of management time. Can we talk?

consultive.name: CONSULTATIVE
consultive.example: Hi! I've been studying the challenges of medical clinics. What's your biggest management problem today?

educational.name: EDUCATIONAL
educational.example: I prepared some material on how clinics are automating appointments. Want me to send it?

friendly.name: FRIENDLY
friendly.example: Hey! I saw you work with clinic management. How's the year going for you?

methodology.question: Do you want me to follow a specific sales technique?
methodology.skip: Skip this step - let the sales rep be free

question.linkedin: How far do you want me to go in the conversation before passing it to you?
question.whatsapp: How do you want me to handle conversations?

description.linkedin: When the person accepts the request, I notify you immediately. You take over the conversation.
description.whatsapp: I receive the message and transfer to you right away. Just log the contact.

description.linkedin: I chat until I identify interest. When the person shows they want to know more, I transfer to you.
description.whatsapp: I ask initial questions, identify if there's real interest, then transfer to you.

schedule_meeting.name: SCHEDULE MEETING
schedule_meeting.description: I chat until I manage to schedule a meeting. I use your scheduling link.

sell_direct.name: SELL DIRECTLY
sell_direct.description: I chat and send the purchase/signup link when the person is ready.

summary.title: Confirm Hiring
summary.readyMessage: I'm ready to start! As soon as you introduce me to the contacts, I'll get to work.

placeholders.when: E.g.: they ask about price, talk about value first

empty.title: No rules defined
empty.description: Add rules to customize how your sales rep should behave in specific situations.

examples.title: Examples of effective rules:
examples.never: NEVER promise deadlines without confirming with the team
examples.always: ALWAYS ask about the problem before presenting the solution
examples.avoid: AVOID overly technical language with non-technical people
examples.prefer: PREFER practical examples when explaining benefits

postHire.title: Sales Rep Hired!
postHire.subtitle: {{name}} is ready to work
postHire.rulesDescription: Define specific instructions to improve your sales rep's behavior.
